item.title: SCOTUS Scolds Hawaii For ‘Relegating’ Americans’ Second Amendment Rights To ‘Second-Class Status’
item.description: You're 'relegating the Second Amendment to second-class status,' said Justice Alito.

item.description: Sooner or later, the ambitious vice president will need to decide which he values more.

item.description: As his Greenland myopia further strains the postwar order, MAGA International and D.C. Republicans alike feel the consequences.

item.title: Trump drops his tariff threats, promising continued negotiations to acquire Greenland
item.description: President Trump is forgoing his threat to impose tariffs on European nations that disagree with his desire to put Greenland under U.S. control.
